parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. **The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DedicatedClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the DTS dedicated cluster on which a DTS task runs.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration or synchronization task.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value must be in the UNIX timestamp format. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value must be in the UNIX timestamp format. Unit: milliseconds. If you do not specify this parameter, the data within the last seven days is returned by default.
